resources.name: 1. List Projects
resources.description: Get all projects for authenticated user (ordered by updated_at DESC)

resources.name: 2. Create Project
resources.description: Create a new project → saves project_id

resources.name: 3. Get Project by ID
resources.description: Retrieve a specific project → refreshes project_id

resources.name: 4. Update Project Name
resources.description: Rename a project (updates updated_at automatically)

resources.name: 5. Delete Project (Empty)
resources.description: Delete a project with no documents → returns 204

resources.name: 6. Delete Project (Has Documents)
resources.description: Attempt to delete project with documents → returns 409 Conflict

resources.name: 7. [VAL] Empty Name
resources.description: Test validation: should reject empty name → 400

resources.name: 8. [VAL] Name Too Long
resources.description: Test validation: should reject name over 255 chars → 400

resources.name: 9. Get Project Tree
resources.description: Get the nested folder/document tree for a project

resources.name: 1. Create Root Folder
resources.description: Create a folder at root level. May return nothing if already exists (idempotent).

resources.name: 2. Get Folder (captures ID)
resources.description: Get folder details. Use this to capture folder_id if CREATE returned nothing.

resources.name: 3. Create Subfolder
resources.description: Create a nested folder inside the parent folder.

resources.name: 4. Rename Folder
resources.description: Change the name of a folder (stays at same level)

resources.name: 5. Move Subfolder to Root
resources.description: Move the subfolder to root level (set folder_id to empty string)

resources.name: 6. Delete Folder
resources.description: Delete a folder (cascades to child folders/documents)

resources.name: 1. Create Document (Simple - folder_path only)
resources.description: External AI pattern: Create with folder_path only, auto-creates folders

resources.name: 2. Get Document (captures ID)
resources.description: Get document by ID. Use this to capture document_id if CREATE returned nothing.

resources.name: 3. Create Document (Optimized - folder_id + folder_path)
resources.description: Frontend pattern: Pass folder_id for speed, folder_path as backup

body.text:
{
  "project_id": "{{ _.project_id }}",
  "folder_path": "Characters",
  "folder_id": "{{ _.folder_id }}",
  "name": "Professor Thorne",
  "content": "# Professor Thorne\n\nAn enigmatic teacher with secrets to hide.\n\n- Age: Unknown\n- Element: All"
}

resources.name: 4. Create Root Document
resources.description: Create a document at root level (empty folder_path)

resources.name: 5. Update Document Content
resources.description: Update the content of a document (name and folder stay the same)

resources.name: 6. Rename Document
resources.description: Change the name of a document (stays in same folder)

resources.name: 7. Move Document via folder_path
resources.description: Move document using folder_path (auto-creates folders if needed)

resources.name: 8. Move Document to Folder
resources.description: Move root document into a folder (uses folder_id)

resources.name: 9. Move Document to Root
resources.description: Move document to root level (set folder_id to empty string)

resources.name: 10. Delete Document
resources.description: Delete a document by ID

resources.name: Projects
resources.description: Project CRUD operations + tree

resources.name: Folders
resources.description: Folder CRUD operations

resources.name: Documents
resources.description: Document CRUD operations

resources.name: 01 File System - CRUD
resources.description: Core CRUD operations for projects, folders, and documents
